corePrinciples: Transparent, customer-first policy for all refunds and exchanges.
Fully compliant with Bangladesh Digital Commerce Policy, Consumer Rights Protection Act, and DPDP.
Every request is logged and auditable. Fraud/abuse is strictly controlled by automated and manual review.
returnableItems: Unworn/unwashed clothing in original packaging with all tags

procedure.step1: Submit a return/exchange request online with order ID and reason.
procedure.step2: Support will contact within 2 working days for eligibility verification.
procedure.step3: If approved, return must be shipped back to our official address (customer pays unless product is faulty).
procedure.step4: Refunds are processed to original payment method within 7 days after QC approval.

disclaimer: This policy may be updated periodically to comply with Bangladesh law and to protect consumer rights.
